topic.label: News Topic
topic.description: Set the news topics you care about to filter and organize relevant news.

collection.label: News Website Collection
collection.description: Manage and access collections of global news sources for content aggregation.

website.label: News Website
website.description: Define specific news website URLs obtained from your selected collections.

text_ai.label: Text AI
text_ai.description: Configure AI models compatible with the OpenAI API to analyze and evaluate news content.

text_to_speech_ai.label: Text to Speech AI
text_to_speech_ai.description: Configure AI services for converting news text into natural-sounding speech.

critique_prompt.label: News Critique Prompt

translate.description: Set up translation services to automatically translate news into multiple languages.
